_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The arising, continuation, rebirth, and: The arising, continuation, rebirth, and manifestation of form
The manifestation of old age and death
The arising, continuation, rebirth, and manifestation of feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness
The manifestation of old age and death
The cessation, settling, and ending of f: The cessation, settling, and ending of form
The ending of old age and death
The cessation, settling, and ending of feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness
The ending of old age and death
